publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3280 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket—That the Parliament congratulates England’s men’s cricket team on winning the Ashes for the first time in 18 years, England’s women’s team for winning their Ashes series against Australia for the first time in over 40 years and Scotland’s cricketers for winning the ICC Trophy and qualifying for the 2007 Cricket World Cup; further congratulates both the Australian men’s and women’s cricket teams for playing their part in exciting Ashes series, and hopes that what was a superb summer for British cricket will help the further development of the game in Scotland. Supported by: Murray Tosh*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, John Scott*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Christine May*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Chris Ballance*, Scott Barrie*, David McLetchie*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-3280 Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket (lodged on 14 September 2005) Alex Fergusson*, Phil Gallie*, Mary Scanlon*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S2M-3280 Mr Jamie McGrigor:Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket—That the Parliament congratulates England’s men’s cricket team on winning the Ashes for the first time in 18 years, England’s women’s team for winning their Ashes series against Australia for the first time in over 40 years and Scotland’s cricketers for winning the ICC Trophy and qualifying for the 2007 Cricket World Cup; further congratulates both the Australian men’s and women’s cricket teams for playing their part in exciting Ashes series, and hopes that what was a superb summer for British cricket will help the further development of the game in Scotland. Supported by: Murray Tosh, Murdo Fraser, Mr Ted Brocklebank, John Scott, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie Stone, Bill Aitken, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Christine May, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Chris Ballance, Scott Barrie, David McLetchie, Robin Harper, Mrs Nanette Milne, Alex Fergusson, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-3280 Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket (lodged on 14 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3280 Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket (lodged on 14 September 2005) Iain Smith*
S2M-3280 Congratulations on a Great Summer for British Cricket (lodged on 14 September 2005) Susan Deacon*
